workouts.name: Push-Ups
workouts.description: An upper body exercise to build arm and chest strength.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: A lower body exercise to build leg and buttocks strength.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: A core-strengthening exercise, targeting abs and lower back.

workouts.name: Mountain Climbers
workouts.description: A full-body exercise that primarily strengthens the core, while also improving lower body endurance and building arm and shoulder stability.
